response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Considering its exceptional quality and rarity, I am offering you the chance to own it for $1,300,000. I understand its worth to you is $1,200,000, but I hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to make a mutually beneficial transaction.
